data.what_is:
VBOUT is an AI-enabled marketing platform trusted by 1000's of businesses worldwide to automate and centralize their marketing while delivering engaging, personalized experiences to their audiences. 

Agencies and partners use VBOUT directly or through a white label setup to build custom plans, manage sub-accounts and share assets from one client account to many.

With VBOUT, you can:

- Manage all your social media from one place.
- Engage with your customers by creating and sending winning email campaigns.
- Design stunning, personalized and dynamic landing pages with no coding.
- Create automations with an intuitive visual builder.
- Nurture leads from click to close - and beyond.
- Grow and maintain your audience lists easily.
- Track and analyze all your marketing activities on a customizable dashboard. 

The platform has easy drag-and-drop landing pages and forms, an intuitive visual automation builder, social media management, email marketing tools and a growing library of pre-built templates for a broad range of marketing campaigns. In-depth, native analytics and lead tracking provide marketers a full view of their pipeline, list engagement and campaign performance.

Growing businesses and agencies trust VBOUT's flexible platform and award-winning, free premium support to help them attract the right customers, convert more visitors into customers, and run complete marketing campaigns in one easy-to-use platform.
data.product_description: All-in One Marketing AutomationVBOUT is built for small marketing teams and agencies that need a powerful, simple and affordable marketing platform to automate customer engagement and increase conversions.Annual and monthly payment plans are available at 1/4 the cost (or less) of competing marketing automation solutions - and starts at $60 per month.Thousands of businesses in over 7 countries trust VBOUT to create measurable results, with full-funnel visibility in a single, flexible platform.VBOUT's agency layer gives agencies the ability to create repeatable, scalable results for their clients.It also integrates with 1000's of apps, 3rd-party software providers and directly to existing tools.VBOUT is simple to setup, easy to learn and results can be tracked in real-time - from anonymous visitor, to lead, to new customer and beyond.

features.name: Customization
features.content: As reported in 17 VBOUT reviews. Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action. This feature was mentioned in 17 VBOUT reviews.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 16 VBOUT reviews. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
It gives me the landing page, database and automations in one place. The ideas that they are comgin with to add AI to help creation of emails or content is amazing. You can now even train your own AI chatbot.
I needed multiple apps to cover all of this before. Now vbout achieves it all and when I do need to connect to other apps, like Zoom the API works easily via Zapier or Pabbly.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
It took a while to change mindset from seprate lists to one big database with list tags. But it does make more sense.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
it makes creating landing pages, subscription and registration to webinars or event easy.
All the followup and reminder emails can be automated and you can also setup triggers to tag and act on sers visiting your website or other actions.
This allows me to run events on zoom and provide a much more feature rich and smooth experience than the basic Zoom.  It even works better and gives me more options than using Zoom Events.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
I have worked with a lot of different tools from Keap to Active campaigns to hubspot to gohighlevel and VBOUT is really very intuitive, userfriendly and has all the features I was looking for. I love that you can group different assets together (landing page, emails, goals) into a group/campaign, which i havent seen any another platform do. The social media posting that integrates with chatgpt is the cherry on the cake.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Would be great to have more options to migrate onto the platform (other than their current offer) for outstanding customer service.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
It has several tools all in one which allows for more efficiency. Its great for those people that have several subaccounts or businesses as well because you can house them also all in one place or service your clients as well from the same hub. It's also at a reasonable price point relative to what they include.

initial_reviews.review_title: Exceptional support and a robust marketing platform
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
From the moment I started using VBOUT for my email campaigns and landing pages, I was impressed by the platform's robustness and user-friendly interface. It has made a significant difference in my marketing efforts, allowing me to execute campaigns with efficiency and creativity. However, what truly sets VBOUT apart is their customer support.

The support team at VBOUT has exceeded my expectations at every turn. Whether I encountered a technical hiccup or needed guidance on best practices for my campaigns, their team was there to assist me swiftly and effectively. Their responsiveness and dedication to solving my problems in a very short timeframe have been remarkable. It's not just about having a powerful marketing tool at your disposal; it's knowing you have a reliable support team backing you up.

For anyone looking for a comprehensive marketing platform that combines ease of use with exceptional customer service, VBOUT is the way to go. Their commitment to their users, regardless of the size of their company or plan, is evident in every interaction. I highly recommend VBOUT to other marketers and agencies aiming to scale their efforts and achieve growth.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
While I've had an overwhelmingly positive experience with VBOUT, there is one feature I find myself wishing for: a dark mode. As someone with visual impairment, I find dark mode not only aesthetically pleasing but also essential for a more comfortable and accessible user experience. initial_reviews.review_title: Professional tools focused on success vs recruiting the next customer
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
What I like most about VBOUT is the control I have right out of the box with all the native integrations and API flexibilty. The ability to build our own systems and then share them with our clients is also one of th emost time saving and valuable features  outside the already fine tuned engined they have built.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
My only issue with VBOUT and it could be my own, is the lack of 2-way sms messaging. I am currently using a 3rd party mobile app though to handle that part directly from Twilio which isn't a bad workaround. I get the platform doesn't really have an inbox feature and maybe that's not what it's for.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
VBOUT is letting me have full control, visually and physically over my automations and work flow. We also use is as a "soft" crm which is a term I didn't know until I started using Vbout but it makes sense.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
- Range of tools that are all good
- Usability in the platform
- Simple flows to create custom automations
- Ability to do social media posting, management along with emails, forms, and crm
- Good at everything means if you aren't picky you can consolidate other tools and just run off one good one
- The Facebook Group has a huge amount of customer and user support from peers and staff.
- The amount of updates and upgrades are amazing
- Easy enough to use nearly everyday.
- I am a business owner and the sole worker, so having all these tools that means I don't need to log into multiple platforms is a blessing

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I have zohomail free for my business, so I need to make a change if I want to use the email portion of the platform, which I just haven't been bothered to do yet.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having to log into mulitple tools and learn each, figure out how to integrate each and manage multiple billing is a massive hassel for me as a single business owner.
VBOUT means I have one log in to a platform that does a whole heap of marketing support work.

I am still learning the platform but I don't expect any problems that I would run into.

The most likable feature of VBOUT is its email automation. For the automation part, I like the contact management, nice logical workflow, chunk sending email, suppression list, browser push, and integration with third-party integration. I also like their form, landing page, and social media integration. I must appreciate its UI. So, anyone can start using VBOUT and set marketing campaign for ease of implementation. The founder and the customer support are very responsive and helpful.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
There is no huge downside to VBOUT. But to me, their email-sending limit is comparatively lower than their competitor's limit.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
VBOUT is the main all-in-one marketing automation and CRM solution for my agency. It helps me to automate my marketing process from landing page making to managing my contacts by executing a thorough sales funnel.

initial_reviews.review_title: Great over all product for an agency
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Vbout has been a great overall marketing automation platform for our agency. It covered the bases on all the key points we need on email marketing, visual automation, social media marketing and landing page creation. With so many more features bundled together all at an affordable cost. On the agency plan, it allowed us to easily toggle between our client's accounts to help them when needed or work on the accounts when we have to. So it is a great all-in-one solution for the price.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
There have been some hick-ups with the solution, but all minor. But I wish they would improve the landing page and email page interface. It works better than most. But expect it was more intuitive for first-time users to reduce the learning curve.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are creating sales & marketing funnels and using Vbouts automation platform to create customized drip campaigns on if-this-then-that scenarios and it works great. Not to mention it allows us to test assumptions using the automation by running multiple landing page campaigns. Plus it is great for social media campaign management or to give you a 360 view of your marketing efforts using its customizable dashboard.

all_reviews.review_content:

all_reviews.review_title: Best marketing automation tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
I have worked with a lot of different tools from Keap to Active campaigns to hubspot to gohighlevel and VBOUT is really very intuitive, userfriendly and has all the features I was looking for. I love that you can group different assets together (landing page, emails, goals) into a group/campaign, which i havent seen any another platform do. The social media posting that integrates with chatgpt is the cherry on the cake.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Would be great to have more options to migrate onto the platform (other than their current offer) for outstanding customer service.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
It has several tools all in one which allows for more efficiency. Its great for those people that have several subaccounts or businesses as well because you can house them also all in one place or service your clients as well from the same hub. It's also at a reasonable price point relative to what they include.

all_reviews.review_title: Exceptional support and a robust marketing platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
From the moment I started using VBOUT for my email campaigns and landing pages, I was impressed by the platform's robustness and user-friendly interface. It has made a significant difference in my marketing efforts, allowing me to execute campaigns with efficiency and creativity. However, what truly sets VBOUT apart is their customer support.

The support team at VBOUT has exceeded my expectations at every turn. Whether I encountered a technical hiccup or needed guidance on best practices for my campaigns, their team was there to assist me swiftly and effectively. Their responsiveness and dedication to solving my problems in a very short timeframe have been remarkable. It's not just about having a powerful marketing tool at your disposal; it's knowing you have a reliable support team backing you up.

For anyone looking for a comprehensive marketing platform that combines ease of use with exceptional customer service, VBOUT is the way to go. Their commitment to their users, regardless of the size of their company or plan, is evident in every interaction. I highly recommend VBOUT to other marketers and agencies aiming to scale their efforts and achieve growth.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
While I've had an overwhelmingly positive experience with VBOUT, there is one feature I find myself wishing for: a dark mode. As someone with visual impairment, I find dark mode not only aesthetically pleasing but also essential for a more comfortable and accessible user experience. Implementing this feature would significantly enhance my workflow and likely benefit others with similar needs.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
VBOUT is helping me create email marketing campaigns and landing pages for my PPC ads campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: VBOUT: Your One-Stop Marketing Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
VBOUT makes creating targeted marketing campaigns incredibly simple. With the drag-and-drop template builder, I was able to quickly put together professional looking emails, landing pages, and forms without any design or technical skills.

The automation features are also fantastic - I can set up sequences and triggers to automatically send emails and push notifications to leads and customers based on their actions. This saves me tons of time compared to manually managing campaigns.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
When I first logged in, I felt pretty overwhelmed by the jam-packed dashboard showing so many features. Wish signup had a simple walkthrough to orient new users smoothly. But the patient support team fielded all my basic questions until I got comfortable navigating.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before, I struggled with piecing together various disjointed tools for my campaigns - multiple platforms for email, websites, analytics, and more. VBOUT has integrated everything into one seamless ecosystem. Now I can track customers from initial leads to conversion funnels with robust segmentation and workflows.

all_reviews.review_title: Professional tools focused on success vs recruiting the next customer
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
What I like most about VBOUT is the control I have right out of the box with all the native integrations and API flexibilty. The ability to build our own systems and then share them with our clients is also one of th emost time saving and valuable features  outside the already fine tuned engined they have built.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
My only issue with VBOUT and it could be my own, is the lack of 2-way sms messaging. I am currently using a 3rd party mobile app though to handle that part directly from Twilio which isn't a bad workaround. I get the platform doesn't really have an inbox feature and maybe that's not what it's for.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
VBOUT is letting me have full control, visually and physically over my automations and work flow. We also use is as a "soft" crm which is a term I didn't know until I started using Vbout but it makes sense.

all_reviews.review_title: Amazing (near) all-in-one tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
- Range of tools that are all good
- Usability in the platform
- Simple flows to create custom automations
- Ability to do social media posting, management along with emails, forms, and crm
- Good at everything means if you aren't picky you can consolidate other tools and just run off one good one
- The Facebook Group has a huge amount of customer and user support from peers and staff.
- The amount of updates and upgrades are amazing
- Easy enough to use nearly everyday.
- I am a business owner and the sole worker, so having all these tools that means I don't need to log into multiple platforms is a blessing

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I have zohomail free for my business, so I need to make a change if I want to use the email portion of the platform, which I just haven't been bothered to do yet.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having to log into mulitple tools and learn each, figure out how to integrate each and manage multiple billing is a massive hassel for me as a single business owner.
VBOUT means I have one log in to a platform that does a whole heap of marketing support work.

all_reviews.review_title: Great over all product for an agency
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Vbout has been a great overall marketing automation platform for our agency. It covered the bases on all the key points we need on email marketing, visual automation, social media marketing and landing page creation. With so many more features bundled together all at an affordable cost. On the agency plan, it allowed us to easily toggle between our client's accounts to help them when needed or work on the accounts when we have to. So it is a great all-in-one solution for the price.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
There have been some hick-ups with the solution, but all minor. But I wish they would improve the landing page and email page interface. It works better than most. But expect it was more intuitive for first-time users to reduce the learning curve.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are creating sales & marketing funnels and using Vbouts automation platform to create customized drip campaigns on if-this-then-that scenarios and it works great. Not to mention it allows us to test assumptions using the automation by running multiple landing page campaigns. Plus it is great for social media campaign management or to give you a 360 view of your marketing efforts using its customizable dashboard.

all_reviews.review_title: A powerful all-in-one marketing automation platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
VBOUT allows me to reduce the number of tools I need to carry out my marketing automation needs, from emails and social media scheduling to contact management. Previously I needed to duct tape quite a few solutions together to achieve what I can do with VBOUT. So for this reason alone, I think this tool is probably one of the best in my arsenal!

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
As great as VBOUT is, it's not perfect. Because it is an all-in-one solution, it is natural to expect that it does not excel in every area it covers. The weakest link here is the landing pages. The page builder is pretty bad and the UI itself overall is not the slickest. However, from what I understand, both are on the roadmap to be improved!

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I needed a better way of targeting my audience to deliver emails or pop-ups that could be triggered once certain conditions were met. This is what VBOUT excels at, and I absolutely love that it also has eCommerce integration so that I can keep track of not only the site views and email opens of my contacts, but also their purchase history.

all_reviews.review_title: VBOUT is a game changer
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
To have a full suite of marketing tools within a single tool is brilliant. I thought it would be clunky and difficult to use but it is really easy and impressive how it all works together. But the most impressive thing about VBOUT is their customer support, I have worked with hundreds of different companies and without doubt VBOUT is number one in terms of the support offered.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I have not really found a downside that is VBOUTS fault, for me it is a learning curve and I need to ensure that I use the support and learn how to maximise its use and maximise its potential for my business.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having my marketing tools in one place and ensuring I keep on top of it all is brilliant. I am not logging in and out of different systems or missing doing things as I can see straight away from the dashboard what I am doing and how things are working. The more I use it the more impressed I become!

all_reviews.review_title: Product not to be missed
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Talk about a product that really does it all for you!  The support is fast and amazing.  The onboarding is incredible with a full academy to make sure you get the most out of Vbout.  Attractive UI makes it a pleasure to work within!

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I am a fairly new user to the system and to this point there is nothing I can think of that would fall under a 'dislike' category for me.
Perhaps more CRM functionality because with that, I wouldn't need ANYTHING else for my systems!  I don't yet have a CRM in place as I'm really hoping Vbout brings one in.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I wanted to be able to reach out to a much wider audience with my products and services.  Now with Vbout I can have a landing page followed by an automation that is a set and forget situation for me.  This literally has me reaching thousands more than I would have done without the product.

2. The Platform is really easy to navigate and use.
3. There are multiple ways the platform integrates with other systems, but my personal favourite is the integration into the website via the elementor plugin.

all_reviews.review_title: Smooth and enriching onboarding and migration experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
The migration support provided by Vbout was second to none. They moved quickly in migrating contacts, campaigns and automations and they were willing to make changes and open tickets to release key user needs that were not already available. I also enjoyed the training provided which ensured that we made use of the system to its full potential.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Some basic user functionality like how automated emails are accessed could have been improved. But once again they looked into how they could make this work for us.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Vbout is supporting our business growth by providing us with the best option in terms of the number of contacts we can house in the CRM. It is also ensuring that we build on those contacts and engage well with them, with features that support list growth and conversion tracking (eg. pop up forms, desktop notifications, & e-commerce tracking).

all_reviews.review_title: It is so nice to have an all in one solution!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
This tool is well worth the money. It's been a solid investment for my company. The customer service is also excellent. They're always happy to help when I have questions or concerns, even after hours. VBOUT allows me to manage all of my social media profiles from one place, design landing pages with no coding knowledge, and schedule marketing campaigns. The interface is straightforward and easy to use. My favorite feature is the dashboard, which allows me to monitor and analyze all my marketing activities.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
It took me a while to get familiar with all of Vbout's tools, but they are similar to many others on the market. I wish they charged based on subscriber count.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am managing all communications and prospect/customer tracking through Vbout. It allows me to stay in one software environment and cut down on a million integrations.

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic marketing automation platform to accelerate your business and generate leads. Try it now !
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
VBOUT is one stop solution to automate your business and enterprise from scratch. The most powerful tool for an end to end automation from generating automatic business leads to enhanced revenue for the organization. It helps in streamlining the campaigning and email marketing activities. Automation of personalized and customized email marketing as per business requirements is the biggest forte and it works well with all kinds of digital platforms and e-dashboards. It's an amazing integration platform and goes well with other software and digital tools.
The affordable SaaS-based pricing model is quite attractive for businesses and also freemium version and free trial are the best motivators that help in making correct and mindful buying decisions always.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
We are still using the freemium version and are quite elated with the experience so far. The various features offered in the free version are going well and have not faced many issues to date. They should keep focussing on offering innovative and creative offerings and business solutions so that attractive new customers do not become a challenge at all.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
VBOUT is the need of the hour for all those businesses today who are looking for business and marketing automation. Social media management is one of the crucial aspects of driving business presence and attracting new customers and it can only happen through VBOUT.
They are affordable and their services are cheap on any front. Go for their free version, free trial period and align your requirements basis their offerings and then decide on your purchasing
Your email marketing, social media management and campaigning activities will get streamlined with VBOUT

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
VBOUT helped us to automate our social media posting on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook. It adds creative features and personalizes the posts for us basis the inbuilt AI and ML technology. It also helps in posting Ads on various websites without much effort. We run various promotional ads and social engagement posts online without much manual intervention.
Generating business leads and accelerated revenue are some important features that help users to sustain with this platform for a long.
Dashboard analytics provides accurate deep data-driven insights which help businesses to determine correct future projections. Robust reporting and analytics through providing customer-engaging dashboards

all_reviews.review_title: Secret One Stop Marketing Solution For SMEs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
It is easy to use yet very powerful. Not only there's email automation, you can also connect and post to your social media with Vbout. There are not many tools in the market that can do both as far as I am concerned. Besides, you can integrate Vbout with other apps by using Zapier or their API if you are geekier. I also like the ability to construct a Landing Page with Vbout and collect leads for my website. Lastly, let's not forget the amazing support if you hit into a road bump.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
The UX and UI need some upgrades. It looks a bit dated at its current stage. While it's a bit of an eyesore for an aesthete like me, it doesn't affect the overall usability of the tool.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
At the moment I am using Vbout 1) landing page to collect leads for my website. 2) to send out monthly newsletter to my B2B customers. While I am using another tool to schedule posts to my social media, I plan to use Vbout for other Promotional Marketing Campaigns in the very soon future.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Very little.
The interface could get a facelift and some features that we would benefit (and likely all platform users) are missing at the moment. For instance, being able to automate posts on SocMed through Automation flows.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Give it a try.
The learning curve is not that steep once you understand how they have structured the platform.
Plenty of features to improve your communications and your understanding of your audience and we know they are building more and more features constantly.
Also, if you value support, there hasn't been a single time they didn't reply fast and accurately. No "canned answers" nonsense.

We are slowly able to understand better how our information is accessed and utilized by our stakeholders so that we can be more effective in our advocacy.

There's only one thing that comes to mind, and that's some of the limitations with built-in reporting. However, their API connection speed/reliability and data capability for custom reporting has significantly helped compensate for that.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
I've worked in and with more platforms in the marketing space than I care to count, and comparing the support and partnership experience of those other platforms to VBOUT, the team at VBOUT, from the significant giving of their time to the willingness to quickly implement customizations for us, the VBOUT team/support is hands-down the best that I have ever worked with.

The onboarding experiences and promises kept are truly appreciated. Absolute kudos to Ryan Bogaardt, Richard Fallah and the team for a solid experience so far, and looking forward to what's in store for the future.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're reducing systems needed, the workload required and increasing capability, with an overall high potential to significantly increase productivity for client implementations and ongoing management.

all_reviews.review_title: My unicorn has finally arrived!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
#1 The Concept - Maybe it's because I have focus challenges, but I've always dreamed of having a central hub for my automation. When focused on one company, I wasn't too pained by separate tools to do the job. However, now there are multiple companies and nonprofits, and I was experiencing serious pain points. I'll admit when I first heard what Vbout had built, I was in the "This is too good to be true" category. And now, after using the Vbout system for a week, I'm a true believer. Someone has FINALLY built a hub that can integrate the best solutions I'm already using, and compliment them with a clean workflow, dashboards to keep me focused, and unlimited customization for when I have the time to dig deeper.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Your first week in anything, there's gonna be a learning curve.
And that's no different with Vbout.
This is also a young product, and there are risks associated with that.
However, here's what put me on solid footing in my choice to invest the time to transition all of our orgs to Vbout.
1. They not only say client feedback influences new features, I've now seen it.
2. When I have ANY issue, I don't have to email or deal with a separate ticket system. Right in the hub, I ask my question and a team member get's back with me. I wish every vendor did that!
3. I've now experienced the talent and passion for service this team has, and I'm a believer.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
ONE DASHBOARD TO RULE THEM ALL - I love how Vbout has given us complete freedom with both what we want in our dashboard and how many unique dashboards we want. I'm also very encouraged how much functionality this has as such a young product. Seriously, I'm sooo excited to see how this product develops, and happy I'm part of it.

VISUAL PROGRAMMING FOR AUTOMATION SEQUENCES - As a creative designer, I always appreciate when a company allows me to visually design programmed elements. I can layout a visual sequence, screancap the flow, and send it off to my advisors for their input. Love it!!

ULTRA RESPONSIVE SUPPORT - I just HAVE to bring this one up again! So often, I've found tools that have such potential and look great... but then you hear crickets when you need some feedback. Look, we're all moving fast and working hard to build our dreams, and we can't risk one of our vendors dampening our momentum by waiting days for answers. Vbout clearly recognizes this, and they make me feel like they are in our corner to help us reach our goals.

all_reviews.review_title: Good Marketing platform for higher ROI

I like the one-stop shop to increase ROI with sms and email marketing.

You can add unlimited contacts, and it was a peace of mind as many other alternatives in the market limit you on contacts or charge higher fees.

You can build unlimited landing pages and can track the performance and conversion, and it helps to run many marketing campaigns effectively.

Email builder is good, and you can build good email templates to run good marketing campaigns.

Social media marketing is also available within the system, and I could connect my accounts and start to have good social media marketing for my channels.

UI is clean and it is easy to navigate and understand the system. It is almost zero learning curve was required to start using this system.

More templates for landing pages will make this application more valuable and attractive.

It helps to build relationships with our customers, and we can effectively monitor the customer journey and can run different marketing campaigns that fit for each cucustomer's need. It is a huge benefit for us, and we are able to listen and speak direct to each customer.

Vbout is helping us to have higher ROI with our marketing, and it is also helping us to save a ton of time by making our processes smoother. More importantly, now we are using one system for marketing than 100 different apps. It is a huge time saver and helps us to focus on our major areas of our business that is conversion and sales.

all_reviews.review_title: Worth to get to start the business!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
They have great tools for anyone to start running an agency! Newsletter campaign, social media, automation, push notification, landing page, and more.
The landing page builder is pretty good, especially with the HTML editor. With a background in web design that I have, this is a great feature that not every platform has. Awesome addition!
The dashboard menu is also fantastic. Even though it's not the best interface design, but it has an excellent user experience. Everything's very straight forward and user-friendly. all_reviews.review_title: A solution that creates Business Sanity
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Vbout is one of those unique tools that does a lot and does it all really well. I am impressed by its ability to address the foundational needs of modern business. I connected my social platforms, email and was ready in a matter of minutes to have a birds-eye view of my social platforms.

Creating landing pages and automated campaigns is also a breeze. I love how easy it is to use and how easy it is on the eyes. Because we spend a great deal of time on the platform, it's important that it looks and feels good. Vbout is pleasurable and easy to use.

Overall, I am a HUGE fan of Vbout and the problem they are solving for. They are aiming to support businesses owners that need to have all aspects of their business easily at their fingertips. This tool helps me feel more empowered.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Because this tool has a lot to offer, for some it could intimidate, but the team offers a webinar to help you navigate the platform with ease. This webinar helps to overcome potential feelings of overwhelm.

This tool also requires a level of commitment to fully leverage and access all that it has to offer. However, as each aspect of the platform can be utilized separately, you can pick and choose which parts of the platform serve your business needs.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
For me, one of the key problems being solved is Business Platform Insanity! I feel that we are hopping from one platform to the next, and Vbout supports the centralization of core aspects of modern business so that you can operate from a sense of sanity versus a sense of confusion.

all_reviews.review_title: VBout is a very diverse tool and does what it says on the label.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
It is much more straightforward to use than many other marketing tools that can be confusing and often have long learning curves that require video tutorials to understand even basic functions.

Its core services are excellent, and I can see them being developed further in the future. I can't wait to see the product mature.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
However, I see it can improve its user interface, which unfortunately feels a little dated. Many competitors have invested in more aesthetically pleasing interfaces that market themselves better and encourage users to engage further with the product.

VBout has an opportunity here to raise awareness of its products through beautiful, simple and user-friendly UI. I hope Vbout is working on this as it will serve to grow the business.

That said, VBout features many different tools that are easy to use and monitor effectively using their platform, which is very well developed already.

VBout provides great value for money for any online marketer at its current price point. Overall, Vbout is a winner!

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
It is a great tool at an awesome price point. If you are looking for one tool that does it all, I highly recommend it.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is a great all-in-one tool. I love the fact that it offers so many tools, without losing context or focus.

all_reviews.review_title: Marketing tool with full features
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
VBOUT is able to manage whole marketing. You can set up a social scheduler for your FB and IG then also manage your contacts and newsletter or create a landing page and run the Funnell. What I like the most is the dashboard. It's really powerful because you can see all metrics and analytics under 1 roof from different data sources.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
The biggest problem of VBOUT is native integration with Shopify. If you have your own store then you are very limited to what you can do in VBOUT. VBOUT does not push all data from Shopify. I'm missing the past orders, value also it can't track the Shopify tags which means I'm not able to create my audience based on the Shopify customers and their lifetime orders. Also if you have more than 1000+ products it takes almost a week to sync all your products back to VBOUT. I'm also missing an "activity" dashboard where you could see what your contacts do at your store. You have to go to each contact and then you can see what each customer does. If you have 10 000 contacts then you have no clue what they are doing and browsing each contact 1 by 1. I'll be doing that for a month.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm happy to use VBOUT mainly for newsletters and landing pages and run our lead magnet. With the capacity what VBOUT offers I can do much more such as schedule my socials, answer the questions via chat etc.

all_reviews.review_title: Very easy to use, especially for marketing noobs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
The drag and drop functionality of setting up email marketing campaigns, the solid templates for the campaigns + emails themselves, and the fact it also includes a social media posting scheduler - so many tools in one, which is awesome! I also love that it includes a landing page builder. I was able to log in and just figure it all out. They do have an on-demand onboarding webinar to learn how it all works, which is super helpful. I haven't watched it yet, though, as it's a solid 1hr 45mins. So far, I've been able to figure out the features I've wanted to use. The support team was also super responsive when I had an issue.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
The social media management could use some work - you can't manage Instagram messages, from what I can see.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
If you're looking for a comprehensive all-in-one marketing tool, VBOUT is a solid option - especially if you're a beginner like me. It's really easy to use.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I haven't had landing pages or email marketing campaigns before, and when I've tried with things like MailChimp, it's been a bit overwhelming and confusing. I have a separate social media manager already which is more robust, but this is a great tool nonetheless to have that functionality in a single place. Overall, I'm going to be using VBOUT to build landing pages and put prospects through a marketing funnel, and start doing more email campaigns in general.

all_reviews.review_title: Very powerful and mature platform!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
I like how it is a very powerful and mature marketing platforms. One of the nice aspects is that it offers Unlimited landing pages and SMS marketing as well apart from emails of course.

Getting started is easy as it offers a step-by-step guide to set up the account when you first log in, so its not overwhelming. The interface is well crafted and organised plus there are a lot of features this platform offers. There are also a lot of automation elements, where I see the power of this tool lies, unlike other platforms where such features are sometimes in their elementary stage of development. A visual automation builder is available to make it easier to create and manage the automation sequences. It is highly customisable and automation filtering has a lot of options as well. One of my favourite features is the Agency feature, where I can easily provide this to my clients.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
The UX is starting to get a little outdated, if this is addressed sooner than later, it will smoothly pass by many more years to come and aesthetics will reflect its usefulness.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
I would highly recommen Vbout, as mentioned before very mature and powerful. If you need to send emails (and you do!) you should definitely consider this.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Vbout helps me reduce the number of separate platforms I have to use to achieve the same outcome. Apart from Emails, it offers SMS marketing and landing page builder, so I don't have to use another platform for these. This increases my productivity and efficiency. Also, the automation builder is very powerful with all the automation elements and visual builder, which makes it easy for me to manage my campaigns.

* Create landing pages with drag and drop
* Align your sales, marketing, and customer service teams
* Offer the ability to get a customized landing page designed for you
* Integrate into your existing platform or use as a standalone

* Support team is helpful and responsive

all_reviews.review_title: Vbout made me a big WOW
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
VBOUT is like a 10-in-1 suite of tools. It has all that I need for automating great quality marketing campaigns.

I loved the Sample Dashboard right when I first used VBOUT - it is super easy and helpful to navigate the platform and imagine what can be done with this Sample Dashboard.

VBOUT also has excellent templates for e-mail and funnel building. With drag and drop, I can easily build emails to reach targetted customers with all features, including videos !!! (1st WOW)

The visual drag and drop marketing automation made me jaw down, because it is so convenient. It is rarely seen else where I must say. And I was nicely surprised to see various templates for the automation offered. I like the Subscriber Book Suggestion automation template - looks really neat and useful (2nd WOW)

The reporting widgets available (about 30 of them) are top notch and offer extremely comprehensive analytics (3rd WOW).

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
VBOUT said it has thousand of integrations. Yes it may, but it should be in "future tense". I have no doubt about the team's capability and that they can develop such integrations, but I may have to wait for sometimes to have those "thousand integrations".

I also think the triggers and actions offered for automation can be richer. I am sure these will be developed overtime and the current are not bad - but as a customer I believe there can be more demands.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have been struggling to set up an ecosystem for my digital marketing needs. I found lots of great apps for it.

Yet the setup is real pain because it is difficult (and sometimes costly) to connect all the systems together. You need a lot of efforts, and lot of money to do that.

Until I found VBOUT. As VBOUT offers a full suite of marketing automation platform, I can do everything I need there, from e-mail templates, marketing campaigns automations, campaign analytics with its 30+ reporting widgets.

It is truly like having a Swiss-knife in hand for marketing. And they truly deserve my WOWs!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Vbout has almost everything I was looking for in a digital marketing SaaS, AND some extras I didn't expect but are excellent additions. I wanted an email marketing solution, but I also wanted SMS via Twilio. Vbout happens to have both of those. I prefer email limits vs. subscriber limits, and Vbout just so happens to be that as well. I wanted agency options, and they have that, too!

The extras I didn't expect but are nice to have: email template builder, the landing page builder, with integrated forms, and for some reason even a social media scheduler, AND social inbox?!

To top that off, there is great, responsive support.

Because Vbout does so much, some may assume it is a "jack of all trades, master of none" but I don't think that is true. It does several things at least as well as competitors, with some extras that are helpful but average. Even if we chop those extras off, the core offering would still be very competitive. It would be unreasonable to expect this to have, say, page-building capabilities that are every bit as good as dedicated page builders ON TOP of the solid core email marketing offerings.

And just to add even more to the offer, there is a comprehensive onboarding process filled with video guides to get you started. Unbelievable.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I want a better website importer. I don't expect the Vbout page builder to be excellent. It is functional, but I have other dedicated builders I can use to make websites. The current importer does an average job of this and has weird quirks (like you have to name the HTML file the same as the zip file, or you run into an error). I would like to see page import better supported, so I can build websites with dedicated builders, import to Vbout, and then integrate that site with Vbout's forms and automation.

A RSS feed feature would also be appreciated in the social media scheduler. Although if I am to be honest, a better way to integrate with outside tools would actually be the best solution to me. I have other dedicated tools already for various tasks, and I do not need to do everything within Vbout.

A more intuitive way to work with the API would also be helpful. It is currently not that user friendly.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Vbout has many tools, but some you might not really need because you already have dedicated tools. Page builder, I already have many. Email template builder I'd prefer Stripo. The social media scheduler does not do RSS, and I already have other schedulers that do the job. A better way to import results from outside tools is preferred. Having said that, DO NOT be distracted by these average extras; pay attention to the very solid core offering!

The core offering of email marketing automation is great. Just be aware of the strict terms of service. The TOS is understandable to protect the company and to protect all users of the platform, but it IS there so, please be aware of it.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Vbout is my primary email marketing platform outside of the WordPress ecosystem (I have other CRMs for that). I wanted Twilio SMS as part of my automation, and Vbout has that. I am also using the social media scheduler for some tasks, but there are no RSS feed features that I am aware of, so this tool sees some but limited usage.

all_reviews.review_title: Jack of all, Master of Some
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
+ Great UI & design, not just in the marketing materials 
+ Support was super responsive through a few initial issues I had in my early testing.
+ Very impressed by the landing page builder
+ The Automation features almost seem a little overwhelming at first, but once I was past my tinkering phase, it's blown me away at the number of possibilities. I'm going to have to lock myself in my studio for a week while I mastermind some devious workflows 
+ Pretty Pop-ups with enough analytics to keep the overthinker in you busy.
+ I quite like the Social posting feature too, but for now I have that part quite well sorted with other apps. Maybe some bold new unique features might tempt me to crossover. ;)

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
* The only pet peeve I'm facing is I'd like it to take in more triggers from Woocommerce. Hopefully, it's something that will improve soon. 

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I've been quite skeptical about all-in-one marketing automation apps ever since having a terrible experience with Omnikick that launched last year. They promise the world but nothing ever works as expected or together, & support seemed perpetually AWOL.

The main reason I decided to give Vbout a chance was because it's a mature product. And to my relief, so far I've been pleasantly surprised.
The benefits I enjoy most are yep, everything (well almost) is under one stage, so I can focus much better.

all_reviews.review_title: One of the best Marketing Automation Platforms out there
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
One of the most challenging parts of keeping up with a marketing campaign is following everything that's happening. It can be hard to see your progress and keep an eye out for new opportunities. Luckily, I've found a solution! My tool of choice is Vbout. This platform not only provides real-time updates but also tracks every aspect of your campaign, from the number of clicks and social media interactions to the number of emails you're receiving. It's all there, and it's super easy to use.

Pros:
- Reliable, stable software (they have been around for a long time)
- Amazing automation and integrations
- Value for money for what it offers

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Cons:
- UI could use a bit of an uplift
- A bouquet full of add-ons can be a bit confusing to comprehend at first.
- Email limits could be better

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Vbout is fully equipped with awesome features that are necessary for online marketing, such as social media integration, lead generation, email marketing, lead nurturing, sales funnel automation, customer support automation, and much more. VBOUT is a one-stop tool for all your marketing automation needs. Just sign up with your email, and you'll be on your way to becoming a marketing master!

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Using the social media automation features, I can schedule my social media posts in advance. VBOUT lets you manage all your marketing activities from a single dashboard. I have used it to manage my social media and create lists for my email campaigns. I like how you can see all your activities and reports in one place

all_reviews.review_title: A must have for any business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
I love how complete an automation package Vbout is. Between landing pages, forms, pop-ups, a mini-crm, emails, sms, push notifications and social, there's very little Vbout doesn't do under one roof. And the reporting features are insane! The few things it doesn't do, extensive integrations mean you can make sure they get done and Vbout knows about it for further automation.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
The UI is a bit outdated and the cost of additional emails could be better, but for the most part these are small gripes. The one thing I would really love to see would be some added features for increasing GMB and other reviews.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest benefit of Vbout has been bringing my workflow and marketing automation almost entirely under one roof, saving tons of time. It's also cheaper than cobbling together loads of different platforms.

all_reviews.review_title: All in one powerful marketing & automation tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
It seems has unlimited features:
- Templates, landing pages, SMS, emails, CRM, social media management covers all the key bases we need to run effective marketing campaigns for multiple business units.
- Custom landing pages with insane analytics and heat maps
- The social media management tool is extremely simple to use
- Full CRM tracking capability - where did leads go, what did they do?
- Calendar utility is useful and avoids unnecessary reliance on other tools.
- It links to WooCommerce, WordPress and even Elementor.
Vbout is absolutely a no-brain deal.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
- Connectors are charged.
- No free email validation
- No lead scoring
- It doesn't link to ConvertBox

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
VBOUT is an all-in-one marketing tool. It can help in email management, quick landing pages, and marketing automation. VBOUT is, without a doubt, much more feature-rich than Klaviyo. I just briefly set up automation and also tried out the social media scheduler and analytics. I am amazed at all the features. I got rid of additional products based on what VBOUT provides.

all_reviews.review_title: Intuitive software with the absolute BEST support for agencies and business owners
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Richard is amazing. He is very responsive to any and all inquiries. He takes client feedback seriously. He is open to new functionalities and requests input on these regularly. The support team is very quick about resolving any issues. We met with many email marketing and automation companies before deciding to partner with Vbout and every demo left us confused. The Vbout team took time to onboard us and help us with our specific use cases. They will also meet with you at any time in your relationship to help you make the most of the platform and show you new features. The platform has an excellent structure that allows you to unlock features as you need them. There are both paid and free features available, but they do not clutter your account if not in use. Like with any digital platform, there are occasional glitches as a result of technology updates. These are minor and resolved quickly so, no complaints!

all_reviews.review_title: Very Powerful Automation Solution!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
In modern business, automation is key to growth. In order to seriously grow your company, you should learn and use automation tools. And for that, i consider Vbout a great asset. It's from a reliable company with a lot of experience and offers a powerful solution that not only does complex automations, but also has a lot of other side benefits.

So what i like best are the automations. You can make a series of broadcasts for anything, from a simple birthday email to a complex series of follow up emails after a purchase. Let's say you want your customer's birthday email to be sent automatically. You can do that, and also create a series of follow ups after the initial purchase.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
The beginning can be a little confusing but they have excellent customer service to help you. What I wish was different is how their e-mail quotas are counted. I wish it was based on the number of subscribers, not the number of e-mails sent.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
A company with a small team will have to do a lot of different tasks and roles at once. So time management is essential.  So not only can we save crucial time, but when it comes to lead generation, automation can help with precision and data collection. We can then use this information to figure out what our customers want, and deliver it to them. Also, there is more to Automizy then the automations. They have landing pages,  push up notifications, task managment, social media inbox and scheduling and so on, all tools that help analyzing and collecting leads as well as understanding customers.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Founder // CEO // International Growth Marketing Digital Agency

all_reviews.review_title: Vbout is a perfect email automation platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
The ability to manage unlimited contacts, create landing pages, build lists using forms, send emails, manage social media accounts and many more vital features from one platform was a big selling point for us to choose vbout. We are actively creating systems to use automation both for our clients and our own brands, and vbout helps us a great deal to automate our marketing campaigns with limited resources. Vbout has many features and also lessons from their academy to get us started with marketing automation.

Vbout pricing also comparatively on a lower side compared it to big players in marketing automation. Which helps us offer more value to our clients.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Integrations and landing page templates are two of the things they need to improve in the near future. I look forward to a more intuitive landing page, email template builder from vbout.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
If you are new to marketing automation or running campaigns for clients as a marketing agency, then Vbout is one of the potential marketing automation platform for you to try.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Vbout helps me to offer better service to my agency clients and also to my personal brands. With vbout marketing automation features, I able to create and test effective marketing strategies for my clients to provide more value. The ability to use social media, email and SMS(twilio) automation under one platform gives me and my time great opportunity to manage our clients' marketing activities efficiently.

all_reviews.review_content:

I like that has a complete set of features, that is all I need for making my sales funnels profitable. I mean from landing pages and form that load fast, to forms, FB audiences connections, many triggers for automations, a basic CRM with pixel tracking and even integrations with plaforms like Pabbly connect, Shopify, Magento, etc. So I can try different welcome sequences and find what works best.

It is very complete tool, with even social media capacities. Sometimes I fear it becomes a too close environment. I sometimes I would like more sales tracking capacity to measure sales for each customer after each campaign. But I am aware that new features are being developed regulary and the team behind is very professional.

For me the key is to find a welcome sequence (from Facebook ads to first sales that work in a short period of time). With the set of features of Vbout I feel that I have all I need to acomplish it. And also to engage and resell to existing customers. With pixel tracking knowing better who is active and how customers behave.

all_reviews.review_title: Marketing automation with endless possibilities
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
My favorite thing about Vbout so far is that it brings so many marketing functions under one roof, and it does all of them well. It will save me a lot of time now that I'm able to disconnect from several other marketing platforms and perform all of that work just using Vbout. The other obvious advantage is that having an all-in-one platform allows me to have a great deal of analytics right at my fingertips.

My experience so far is that it has been very easy to get started with Vbout. Setup has been pretty intuitive, and everything has worked as expected.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I think that the landing page designs could be improved, but other than that I'm very pleased with Vbout. And although Vbout already has Zapier integration, I look forward to seeing more native integrations with some other platforms that I use regularly within my business.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
There are so many ways to customize my campaigns and automations, which is perfect for creating great funnels and optimizing how I interact with leads and customers. That has been a weakness in my business, partially due to cobbling together several different marketing platforms, so I am now using Vbout to tie everything together and create a cohesive journey for my audience.

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic Marketing Automation Tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Their email automations. Automations. Their automations are almost as powerful as ActiveCampaign (I'm serious). I've used ActiveCampaign for a long long time and I've been a HUGE advocate of theirs (still am for larger clients and for my own agency), but I can do almost all the automations on Vbout that I used to do on AC. Now, I said almost because I might come across something that can't be done later on, but I won't know till I reach that stage. The only con is the UX needs improvement (you can't find their filters or logic paths till you drag out a trigger/action unlike ActiveCampaign).

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
The UI and UX can be improved a little. I spent quite some time learning the platform even though I consider myself a fairly experienced email marketing user. Support was fantastic though, since they basically walked me through the whole thing

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Talk to their support if you need help

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm using Vbout to handle my ecommerce store's transactional emails and abandoned cart sequence. It's really very powerful and integrates with all the leading solutions like Zapier and has webhooks too.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent All-in-One Marketing Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
I can honestly say that the UI is very intuitive for me and the feature set offered between the pipeline manager (which I love, btw), automations, running email campaigns, unlimited landing pages, contacts and social profiles is excellent.  I have about 5 tools in my current tech stack that VBOUT will be able to completely replace. Also, support is quick and amazing; the entire VBOUT team is very customer-centric and it shows in their follow-up.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
A couple of items on my wish list:
- I, too, would like a great email sending limit if possible, particularly with the ability to add custom SMTP.
- I actually like the landing page templates you have. An ability to import our own templates will be nice
- Integrations with Pabbly and MuxEmail will be greatly appreciated.
- A/B split testing on landing pages

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Take a look at VBOUT, at least the free trial, and see if it can be a tool you can base your marketing workflow on.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Overall, I am very happy with the feature set offered by VBOUT and the ability to easily manage marketing campaigns. Support is amazing and the roadmap is exciting; I'm looking forward to seeing more of what VBOUT can do. VBOUT offers its features at better limits and better price points than competitors.

all_reviews.review_title: Do companies like this even exist anymore?

The best thing about Vbout isn't their platform (which is top-notch) it is their service and desire for their client to succeed. The onboarding and support I've received to get us up and running are amazing!

Not to mention that when I scheduled an intro call on Dec 23, 2020, and got on the call - the host was Vbout's CEO Rich.  He gave his sales staff time off to enjoy the holidays. This level of commitment to clients is seen throughout the entire organization.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Hopefully, in the future, there can be a native integration with Salesforce. The integration we have now is good for us. This is the only slightly negative thing I can say. But they have a work-around that is very effective!

all_reviews.review_title: A New (and needed) Approach to Workflow Automation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
The way Vbout is structured, you pay for mailing from your automation tool, not for the number of contacts that you have in the system.  This is a paradigm shift from Pardot, Hubspot, Marketo and others.  In my opinion that makes better sense as now I can dump my ESP and do all my campaign mailing directly from Vbout with full integration of results dumped directly into Salesforce (and any CRM).  I also cannot say enough about the support, it is fantastic and extremely responsive.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
The social media piece of the platform is still getting its feet.  It looks to try and emulate Hootesuite's look and feel, but all of the features are not fully fleshed out yet.  It's not that big of a deal as social is only one part of the equation.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
The cost is what really attracted us, it is thousands of dollars less than anything comparable.  The attention we get from their team is simply unmatched by any platform I have used in my 25 years in digital marketing.  It is a new direction for CRM automation, and in my opinion one that has been needed for a long time.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Complete end to end workflow automation is simple in Vbout.  The workflow visualization is super easy to use, and once you get used to the templates and editors for both Landing Pages and Emails, it is very easy to create a campaign from scratch.  This saves me all kinds of time over my previous platform (Hubspot) and makes it really simple to launch and monitor campaigns in one interface.  Great dashboard utilities as well.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent Platform & Support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Vbout is an outstanding marketing automation platform, without the bloat that most competing platforms have. We see it as more of a blank slate to build what we want, without the clutter of all the things we don't need. That said, it has the features and functionalities of many big-name marketing tools, at a fraction of the cost and much better customer service.

A big issue I have with some of the other tools is customer support. Other companies tell you to consult a forum or user group or add it as a requested feature. Vbout does an exponentially better job at actually solving issues we have and their support staff seems to always be there, waiting for us to ask them questions.

Along with the support, the features and functionalities are there to make some pretty powerful automations and track customers through their buying process(s).

We are still very new to the platform, but very excited for the future with Vbout and the capabilities it has unlocked for us. Overall, we were happy with our previous marketing automation tool, but now we're even happier and very glad we switched. This should say something...they took happy customers from another platform and exceeded expectations. Now that we know what we were missing, we're staying with Vbout.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
There isn't much of anything I dislike. The few things that haven't worked exactly how I thought were either user error or fixed ASAP.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Talk to them and get a demo. We're very happy with it and were very surprised by how great the platform performs.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were experiencing some marketing costs getting too high as the company has grown. Vbout pricing structure and ease of use to build exactly what we want fits our needs much better.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Rich and his team are incredibly responsive and collaborative. Any time I have reached out they quickly respond and offer insights. Rich has made himself available when we have needed him to and we truly feel partnered with the VBOUT team. They actively work with us to help improve our experience on the platform and have provided training to help our entire team become proficient in VBOUT. They have been nothing but fantastic.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I cannot say that I have found any downsides to VBOUT so far. They are proving to be a step above our previous provider.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Reach out to Rich and have a conversation. He can quickly, yet informatively, give you a run down of the platform and its capabilities. If you, like us, are looking to be more than just another account number, I highly suggest VBOUT. Their business functions much like ours as I feel they are just as invested in us as we are in our clients.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using VBOUT as a replacement for our previous CRM while also utilizing the Email Marketing aspect of their platform with plans to expand into their Marketing Automation solution. It has been incredibly convenient to have all of our contacts not only together in one place, but also organized better than before. Having forms able to be integrated with specific lists from the get-go has streamlined out lead sorting processes and helped both our sales and marketing teams. The email design aspect is sleek and easy to pick up. This has resulted in higher efficiency on email design and their email reporting has made it easier than ever to provide our clients with email content that interests and engages them.

all_reviews.review_title: VBout Combines the Features of Multiple Applications into One Elegant Package
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
VBout's solid automation system, easy customer management, and smooth integration with applications like WooCommerce and Google Analytics that I use every day in my workflow make it an obvious choice. It has a strong user interface, and makes setup of your customer funnels a breeze. Getting from point A to point B is incredibly easy. We've been able to turn a number of tedious manual workflows into smooth, simple automations that save us time, and make customer data collection and pre-qualification practically run themselves.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
The e-mail builder does still leave a bit to be desired, which offers a fairly broad degree of customization, but currently lacks a few key features and makes it occasionally difficult to easily reach the desired result.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm currently using VBout to give personalized results to our two sets of clients, sending each through individual funnels to properly get them the goods and services they need, while increasing customer engagement and purchase amount.  We've seen immediate results, with large numbers of customers interacting with our forms and signing up for things like browser push notifications in the first month. Having all of the relevant customer information in one database, combined with analytics, shopping cart information, and other notes, is extremely useful.

all_reviews.review_title: Best Marketing Automation for SMBs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
I have tried several marketing automation systems and Vbout has been superior; much better than SharpSpring and InfusionSoft when it comes to SMB marketing.

Key Benefits:
- Ability to have a dedicated IP, so you can now control your IP health and not have a random user you never met affect your email deliverability
- Seamless ability to add SMS to your drip sequences

Emails and SMS automations:
- Native Twilio integration allows SMS drips
- Easy to create drip sequences between emails and SMSs with visual automation workflow builder
- Ability to copy and past entire instances makes it so much easier when on-boarding new clients, this is key for agencies.

Integrations:
- Hubspot CRM
- Twilio
- Canva

Support:
-  I had previously been using SharpSpring which did not always notify the user on real email deliverability as leads were being suppressed without notification. Vbout support looked into the issue and resolved it increasing deliverability by over 27%, and have now built nifty features to ensure that emails are being sent correctly. When you share your input with the team they actually took it seriously and further developed their SaaS tools.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Vbout's CRM could be more robust, but we just use their Hubspot CRM native plugin so it doesn't affect me.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
I would recommend Vbout to any SMB that takes marketing automation seriously.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Vbout allows us to easily create complex automations and track them all in realtime. It is truly our marketing engine. Their social publishing feature has allowed us to condense our marketing operations into one platform as opposed to using multiple platforms. Their recent Canva integration just did that for us as well.

all_reviews.review_title: Marketing Automation Platform that is full feature, price friendly, surprisingly easy to use
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
I really like the ability to spin up an awesome, professional looking landing page quickly and easily. My orginization haddn't utilized landing pages as much as we should have because the platform was just not as easy to use or complete as Vbout.
The automation builder is really cool as well. Very intuitive to use and it's extremely powerful too.

While the above are awesome, the best part about Vbout is probably the people. From on-boarding, to your dedicated success manager, and the live support team, everyone is fantastic and really goes the extra mile to make sure you and your team are getting the most out of Vbout. It far and away the best support team I have had the pleasure of working with on a platform like this.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
One of our concerns was the structure of data. Were a sales agency, and have many targeted lists, various messaging, and on and on, and we were concerned that About may be a bit light on the data management piece.

Well they rolled out a fantastic update yesterday, 1/28/20, that improves everything from views to filters, to the ability to create deals. We walked through it yesterday, and without even having a chance ot dig our teath in, this could be a game changer. We currently use PipeDrive CRM, but that may become redundant if the functionality is as good here as we think.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
If your looking for a comprehensive solution I would strongly suggest Vbout. It has everything you need and as new platform the team is constantly looking for real feedback from their customers on ways to make the platform better and they have already made a major upgrade since we came on about 2 months ago. And when price is factored in, there really is no comparison that I have found with a platform this good and this comprehensive at this price point.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are finding the most efficient way to reach out to prospects while customizing the messaging for specific groups of prospects. I think that with automations, landing pages, and the email campaign builder (and the ability to template almost everything in the system) is going to really allow us to increase our conversions and focus on selling, which is the ultimate goal.

We love the ability to whitelabel Vbout. It gives us a let up on our competition when going to pitch a client and so far feedback from our 'test' client has been fantastic.
