all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
As a novice marketing platform user and new startup founder, I find Vbout easy to use.  Their staff was extremely helpful (they did everything) with the integration of my website in the platform.  Customer service seems to always be available and ready to help with any situation.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I can't say that I dislike anything about Vbout.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
The Vbout marketing platform has been instrumental in helping me get my startup to the next level
(a profitable business).  The customer service they provide feels more like a partnership.  As someone who started from scratch (retired police officer), Ive been able to create a successful business with the help of Vbout.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
My business relies almost solely on delivering emails to our users.  Whether it's user messaging, marketing emails, or email automations, Vbout has greatly improved my email deliverability and solved many issues regarding blocked and suppressed emails.  They've included a spam check that gives your email a spam score before sending which I found very helpful and gave me useful insight regarding email creation.
* Our last email sent was delivered to 1,154 users with 601 opened, and 514 clicks by 442 users.  Impressive!

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic integration support makes all the difference
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
My responsibility is in enabling our business through the technical integration of our systems with Vbout. In that context, our experience has been very positive. The API is well documented and the Vbout team is very responsive to any questions. A true partnership experience to ensure our success, not simply selling a monthly subscription.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Vbout is built on a "web-first" rather than a "mobile-first" strategy, which is the opposite of the approach we have taken for our business. Consequently, the capabilities we needed were not originally available out of the box. The team did an amazing job listening to and responding to our needs with practical solutions.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are automating marketing flows for our products to improve conversions. It's a vital tool in our overall arsenal.

all_reviews.review_title: A great automation tool and super helpful team
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
I like that I know I can rely on the VBOUT team to offer impromptu training and help me with problems. It has happened on more than one occasion that I emailed Richard in the morning and had a response (and suggested training time) within the hour. Richard is always very helpful over our calls, and takes the time to make sure I understand the automations properly and how to make them work for me.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
There are some teething pains with regards to designing emails, but this should be worked out soon. If you can code you should be fine!

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
If you want to send automated emails and manage social media/ user journeys easily, then this is a great tool. Just make sure you have a clear design in mind and get the VBOUT team to help you with creating this as an email template.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have saved lots of time with the creation of automated emails through VBOUT, as well as using it for social media and managing the engagement of those platforms.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I wish that VBOUT would allow me to schedule Instagram posts. A reminder message does not always help when I have a busy day and don't have the time to post.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am able to solve the issue of having to think of ideas for tweets on a daily basis. I can spend my time in one setting crafting tweets and ideas and schedule it all, without fear of errors or forgetting the idea behind the post.

What I've encountered is that no matter what my client's needs are, from simple newsletter deployments to complex automations, I'm always able to deliver. And their supports is superb!

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
The team at Vbout has been very accommodating in helping me achieve the results I've needed... so, naturally, I can't complain! I've reached out to them several times, even with custom modifications to their software, and they've come through every single time.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
The user interface is simple, the system works accurately and their support team is the best! Take the time to study the layout and you will be running in no time.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am able to spread a message using Vbout and see not only statistics, but actual tangible results. Such as filling up events with registrants and sales conversions. Important decisions are also made thanks to their analytics and the ability to see a potential customer or client's journey.

all_reviews.review_title: Marketing automation at its best
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Customer support and attention to details is second to none.
Our organisation is relatively new to the Marketing automation hype, so at times we bombarded Vbout with (perhaps silly) questions and requests. Kudos to the Vbout team, they always attended to our issues in a swift manner and went above and beyond to satisfy our needs.

The platform itself is a very intuitive with a bundles of features that you'd get from several other software providers, all wrapped in one neat package. And best of all, Vbout team is working tirelessly to continuously update their platform with new features.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Features such as webhooks lack a customization freedom that email automation and landing page builders enjoy. However, that's a one small dislike in a sea of likes.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Vbout allows us to unify all of our data to have a thorough overview of marketing activities on our website whilst allowing us to segment customers and target them in a more precise manner.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
You can't beat the price considering all the features.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Still a little buggy. Having used Act-On as well as some of the email only platforms (Mailchimp, iContact, Constant Contact) Vbout is definitely right in the middle. There are areas for improvement.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
If you are on a limited budget but want to move past the email only platforms, VBOUT is definitely worth looking at. They are young. However, they are growing and willing to listen to user experience.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email marketing, social media publishing, landing page builder. Before we were using multiple platforms. It's nice that everything is accessible from one login!

all_reviews.review_title: Vbout Makes My Job SO MUCH Easier!!!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Vbout's social media functions, hands down! With Vbout, you can write dozens of posts for Facebook, LinkedIn, and/or Twitter and schedule them to be posted for you while you're focused on other aspects of marketing! Just write one post, create a custom schedule and select all dates and times for posts to occur and you're all set! Honestly, working 2 hours a week for a very small and wonderful non-profit, doing marketing AND development - I could not do my job without Vbout.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I have plenty to learn about all of the other wonderful things Vbout does! Currently I limit my use of the website to the social media tools but I hope to use it for more in the future.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
You can feel safe and comfortable using this product! It does so much, I'm still learning ways to use every aspect of it! I can tell you from personal experience that any problem or question you have, reach out to customer service!!! They are the best!! They'll work with you, they follow up, they adjust based on your needs - I have rarely encountered better customer service.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our community nonprofit relies so much on getting people to attend our programming - which is VAST, varied, and all different! Vbout makes it so easy for us to consolidate information in one place and send it out to our network without us having to make a point every day to spend a lot of time on social media marketing.

all_reviews.review_title: All the Marketing Tools you Need and Incredible, Unbelievable Support!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
The Software is incredibly powerful for what you pay for it.  Vbout is bringing high end Marketing Automation to the masses with their latest release.  It's easy to use, but complex automations can be made and sorting through the logic workflows doesn't take long to grasp and when you need help, their support team is on it in a jiffy.  I've been in the Internet Marketing space for over 22 years, and I have NEVER come across Support like the Vbout Team.  Every company can take a page from their playbook!

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Not much.  But as a reseller, they could improve the billing method a tiny bit so that your clients do not get email notifications of the billing that is going on.  They do have a way around that, but if I'm nitpicking, it could be improved.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Get Vbout.  Seriuosly, unless your requirments are not supported, which woudl be rare, there is NO reason to go elsewhere.  They have it all.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking for an affordable, yet truly comprehensive marketing automation platform that we could use to resell to our fantastic clients and integrate to our current development platform we have built.  After researching probably 40-50 solutions over 3-4 months, we settled on Vbout and could not be happier!

all_reviews.review_title: Moved from Marketo to Vbout and have no regrets!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
1. Interface!
User experience is everything: when you have a "drag & drop" environment vs a clunky old-school UX, your day-to-day becomes so much easier and inspiring!
2. Customer support!
Is my everything #2. I get live support within a couple of minutes. Everything is configurable and can be a subject for a discussion with the Vbout development team.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Nothing. It's the best value and money (not for money). The platform has social media integration, publishing tools, user journey and many things that other platforms (including Marketo) don't have. I look forward to Vbout rolling out even more cool features I can play with.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Vbout has a free version for up to 5 users (not trial!) So go ahead, create an account for yourself and start testing the platform. Moving to Vbout from Marketo was the best tactical decision so far.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
After years of investing in Marketo and getting zero support from them (I tried to reach out with questions and got their rep try to upsell me a few times instead as a response), we needed a user-friendly marketing automation that can increase our marketing productivity and provide an environment for creating multiple user journeys.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Nothing I can think of. Any problems we have are addressed immediately.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Go for it! You can cancel at any time if you don't like it, so you aren't locked into a contract. However, you will probably not want to stop using it once you start. It's a great platform!

We are also now able to track our contacts as they browse through our website and can monitor their level of interest. It has really helped us understand the user experience on our website and how we can convert more prospects into leads.

I am a big fan.  I literally have nothing bad to say.  I've been a client for several years now.  I know I sound like Vbout's Dad, but I love the product and the service.

No question.  Try it.  I'm a customer, (and I like to think a pretty tough one).  If they weren't good, they'd get kicked out the door.  But as it is... Look.  I'm a bust CMO.  I don't have time for mucking-about and I'm taking the time to write Vbout a glowing review.  What's that tell you?

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
My Marketing Department absolutely depends on it.  I'm the guy who brought the program into the company.  I'm the CMO, so I check these things out VERY carefully.  They are quickly responsive to e-mails and calls and they are responsible, meaning they take responsibility for problems (even ones they didn't cause) and they provide solutions to problems.  Not some time.  Every time.

review_question_answers.answer: I am a big fan.  I literally have nothing bad to say.  I've been a client for several years now.  I know I sound like Vbout's Dad, but I love the product and the service.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
review_question_answers.answer: No question.  Try it.  I'm a customer, (and I like to think a pretty tough one).  If they weren't good, they'd get kicked out the door.  But as it is... Look.  I'm a bust CMO.  I don't have time for mucking-about and I'm taking the time to write Vbout a glowing review.  What's that tell you?

review_question_answers.question: What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: My Marketing Department absolutely depends on it.  I'm the guy who brought the program into the company.  I'm the CMO, so I check these things out VERY carefully.  They are quickly responsive to e-mails and calls and they are responsible, meaning they take responsibility for problems (even ones they didn't cause) and they provide solutions to problems.  Not some time.  Every time.

all_reviews.review_title: VBout rocks - easy to use, amazing team to help!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
I have been using VBout since it was in Beta, and love VBout. My team finds it easy to use, intuitive and functional.
We have given feedback continuously, have seen the platform make amazing strides in a short time. We regularly communicate with the team, and make requests for features, that have been implemented, and exceeded our expectations. This is a highly dedicated and responsive management and support team!

VBout is not only intuitive but is also nicely laid out visually so it makes it easier for our team to navigate social media marketing automation for clients virtually. With Vbout we can run all of our campaigns from one overall place, with each client having a separate log in for their own checks + balances.

And we can run robust reports for these clients whenever needed.

Overall, this helps us save time and money, and in the long run helps us to be more efficient as an agency.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
We have been working with the VBout team regularly to give feedback for suggested adjustments and tweaks.. We don't dislike anything at the moment.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
TRY THIS TOOL! It's so intuitive that it makes it fun + easy to use.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Our need was for marketing automation of our social media campaigns for all of our clients (and our own marketing) as well as sequential marketing which includes landing pages.

We needed a robust tool for the marketing automation of our social media campaigns for clients - this was the #1 reason for using Vbout. We needed unlimited social media profile links including Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram. Vbout offers the benefit of ease of use, and we can schedule content, edit that content, and run client reports. We have separate log-ins for our clients to give them individual access to their portion of the platform when needed.

We also use of Landing Pages and less frequently use the Email Marketing. Our graphic designer was able to learn the system quickly and easily,  and the results have been really sharp looking and technically advanced Email Marketing campaigns. The benefit is efficiency and professional marketing to help us stand out.

Overall, the support of the VBout team has been exceptional - they listen to us as experts and help us figure out the best ways to use their system regularly. Each time we have a new team member, they get trained properly, and we are always learning new tips as the system expands and grows.

We couldn't be happier with VBout!

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: President & CEO & Social Media Marketing Strategist

all_reviews.review_title: Well thought-out marketing automation platform for Small Business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
We love that Vbout is a comprehensive marketing platform that provides an all-in-one solution that simplifies our day-to-day processes through automation, e.g. onboarding new members or sending out the newsletter to the existing community.

Even though we only started to use it, but we have been very satisfied with what the system can do for us to reach our audience. The account setup was quite easy and the customer service was very efficient. Their knowledge library contains e-books, webinar and blog posts and is a great resource to learn about marketing strategy or the system in general.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
We have nothing bad to say about the platform or the people from the company. Only curious about if the platform will expand on the CRM aspect as we're currently using another system. It's not a deal breaker at all. Vbout is great for marketing and we understand if they choose to focus on what they're good at.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
The need to manually doing the following processes:
* export/import user list to Vbout => solved by Vbout's connection with Zapier
* design and send out newsletters => they have beautiful templates to choose from
* remember to schedule and send out individual emails => their journey component makes it easy to set up a drip campaign

all_reviews.review_title: Simply outstanding - Everything you need to automate your marketing.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
1) All-in-one solution:
Analytics, landing pages, email marketing and heat-maps all in one package.
Having these different service united makes them far more efficient and easier to use.

2) Beautiful interface:
The interface is simple and intuitive. The design is very clever: It offers plenty of options without being overwhelming.

With a few clicks you can create beautiful landing pages or emails.
The system also has plenty of options to customize the design exactly how you want it.

There is also a handy draft feature, so if you change your mind about something, you can easily go back to an older version.

3) Excellent customer support:
The help database has plenty of useful videos so you can get info fast.

If you are stuck, you can click on the chat button and a real person will respond to you, usually within in minutes during office hours. The level of the support is very impressive.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I have nothing to complain about! It works perfectly. In fact, I am continually surprised by how it exceeds my expectations.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Just go for it! It is perfect and outstanding!

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
I want to set up a landing page to collect my customer's emails.
I also want to be analyze how customers interact with the landing page so I can optimize the page to increase sign ups.
Finally I want to be able to email the customers that signed up.

Before using Vbout, I had to use different services from different companies. It was very confusing and the products from the different companies didn't work well together.

Vbout has fixed this creating a single product that is quick, easy and simple to use.

all_reviews.review_title: Vbout is my primary newsletter and marketing platform.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Vbout is the most user-friendly email marketing platform - I've tried several. In addition to the platform being great, I also really enjoy working with the Vbout team. They are industry experts and I actually trust them as an extension of my own team, frequently running marketing ideas and questions by them. Furthermore, the Vbout support team is unparalleled in their response time, skill, and ability to curate solutions for each users' needs.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I don't think I have any dislikes.  Would highly recommend the platform!

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
There are 3 important decision making questions:
1. If I need help how responsive, knowledgeable, and experienced is the support team?
2. How much time will I need to spend learning the platform and then training my team?
3. Can I scale my business with this platform or are the functions limited?

Asking these questions makes choosing Vbout a very, very easy decision.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were able to create a tailor-made newsletter campaign, which is important for our brand.

Once an e-mail campaign is sent, the stats and analysis that Vbout provides are an incredible resource for understanding customer behavior and interests, and for crafting future newsletter campaigns.

There are a lot of tools that we have even delved into using yet; but I like knowing that as our company scales, we can scale within the Vbout platform.

all_reviews.review_title: Proof that it pays to research
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
For someone new to marketing automation, Vbout may not seem simple, but as someone coming from Marketo, Vbout is a breath of fresh, simple air! From initial domain verification to building an automation template, Vbout just makes sense. Plus, having Social Media management built is was a huge plus!

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
Manipulating the included email and landing page templates can be a bit challenging, but once you've set up your templates, you really shouldn't have much to do on that front. In addition, you can import your own code, so it's the best of both worlds. The use of lists as the sort of driving force behind the contact database was a bit of shift in thinking for me to wrap my head around, but with no real limits to how you handle segmentation, it really isn't an issue.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Do your homework, take advantage of the trial offers that are out there and be sure that you talk with the folks at Vbout.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
For us, we're expanding our marketing capabilities without the cost and resource requirements that are needed with a platform like Marketo. Sure, there are features that Marketo has that Vbout doesn't, but because we can more easily implement Vbout, we're getting way more out of it than we were with Marketo. And, the features we lost were just "nice to have" things anyway.

all_reviews.review_title: Awesome Platform for Small Businesses
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
First up the pricing.  I had been looking for an affordable Marketing Automation platform for a while, however everything I found was extremely expensive and with a limited marketing spend I could not get management to sign off on the expense.  vbout came in at a fraction of the cost  and the level of tools is comparable to higher profile & cost systems.  The other thing I love is just how far it has come and how much ownership listens to advice you provide.  Having worked with the system for a little over 12 months now it has grown tremendously in function, look and ease of use.  It is exciting to work with a system where I can say my input has contributed to that function now being available for all to use.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
A lot of work has been done on the email builder, but I feel still more needs to be done.  Coming from mailchimp the ease of use, and having things just work in layout and design is not quite there, but it is getting better all of the time.  The mail system was very basic when I signed up, however today it is much more visual, making mail creation easier, however getting some things to work the way I want can be tricky.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
If you spend $80 or more on mailchimp, then you should really be on vbout.  With their base paid plan the benefits you will get on this will far outweigh what you will see within mailchimp.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
The core product we use in vbout is the email marketing and email automation.  For our general eblasts it has made it easier to get our updates out to all of our platforms and when it comes to automation we have only touched the surface of what can be done.  Our Magento site was recently integrated with vbout, which allows us to send marketing material based on individual product purchases.  What this means for us is if someone buys a piece of equipment like a Vacuum packing machine, we can send a mailer directly to these clients in 6 months time to see if they need more vacuum bags.  We feel this to be a very powerful tool for our business

all_reviews.review_title: Vbout Review By A Digital Marketing Manager
all_reviews.review_content:

We came across Vbout by chance when looking up data for bounce codes. Since our first contact to present all of the staff have been very accommodating and helpful in all of our marketing endeavours. Their team exhibits professionalism and superior customer support at all turns.

If you are looking for a platform to combine your social/email/website data this is the right company for you. The support system will captivate you and the ongoing updates will leave your star struck.

We were in the process of setting up Hootsuite when we found Vbout by accident, through a blog. We were in need of a social media management too for our clients. At the same time we were looking to combine our email platform and social.

From the start we have seen tracked interactions with our clients customers. This is vital data as we now have  greater insight as to the actions they are taking, and where they are in the sales funnel.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool at great price with stellar customer support and ability to customize to fit your needs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
Working with Vbout has been great! We are a membership based nonprofit and Vbout has an agency account set up that we've utilized so we can provide individual Vbout accounts to various groups of our members across the country. It has been simple for our member groups to set up and use and they are empowered to send emails and use other marketing features autonomously while our organization can still oversee everything and report to our funders based on the data we receive from multiple accounts. Vbout even worked with us to build out a custom integration with Salesforce so we could make sure the data passing back and forth between our two systems was exactly how we needed it. The product was great but even better is Vbout's customer service and interaction. Rich and the team at Vbout were so friendly, responsive and capable of implementing simple solutions based on our complex business requirements in ways that no other vendor/tool we looked at could do (and within the budget we had). They seem to bend over backwards to make sure we have exactly what we need and it doesn't go unnoticed. Feeling good about a company you work can count for a lot.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
There isn't much to dislike about Vbout. Some of the marketing automation features have been a great bonus to some of our more marketing savvy member groups while being a bit overwhelming to look at for other groups that are just learning about how to use marketing and technology tools to empower their work. I wouldn't say that is negative, it just requires a little more hand-holding from our organization to make sure the "new marketers" are directed to the basic tools as a starting point while waiting until they get experience to use some of the more robust features in Vbout.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Ask if Vbout can meet any crazy business needs you are trying to accomplish because it probably can be set up to do it.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
We needed an email tool for multiple groups of members that have organized regionally across the country. The tool needed to give the groups autonomy to run as individual organizations but also have the integration with our database so that we could push and pull data into Vbout and our CRM for reporting and opt-in/data regulation. Vbout did this and much more! Our internal stakeholders have been extremely impressed by the solution we delivered to meet their goals and that it was in a price range that doesn't break the bank for these small regional based groups.

all_reviews.review_title: Vbout facilitates marketing automation for agencies
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
One thing I love about Vbout is the ease with which I can schedule out my posts so that I don't have to think about it later.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
It would be interesting if we could white label the communications so that it appears that the information was posted by the client account rather than by Vbout.  I also find that it is very difficult to manage the coding and editing in the Landing Page Feature at Vbout.
The other think that doesn't make so much sense is that when I post a link, let's say it is a video link, it shows up as a static image in Facebook and twitter such that the user is unable to click on the picture and press play.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Implementation with Youtube, Google+ would be beneficial as well as with Instagram so that we can automate postings there so if Vbout can work on the API's for the three most used social media outlets.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
The business problems I am solving is the ability to automate posts and generate followers for the clients we manage.  The other problem we are solving is the ability to report on the analytics for our clients.

all_reviews.review_title: Highly satisfying, absolutely recommended.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
It is very intuitive, has many highly useful functions, the support staff are the nicest people ever and are always willing to help you with anything you might need. The platform has never given me any problem that couldn't be solved and they are always there to listen to your needs, sometimes even willing to improve and update certain functions based on realistic and viable suggestions.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I honestly don't know what to write in "what do I dislike" about the platform. In my experience, my current status about VBout is "so far, so good". Maybe I would add more language options, but that isn't exactly something "I dislike" is just something I know will be added gradually.

Recommendations to others considering VBOUT:
Give it a try as a free account and see yourself how good it is.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
VBout added many business intelligence tools to my previously basic email marketing needs. Now it is really easy to identify many user behavior stats that I wasn't even aware existed before. Also, many things can be automated, which lightens my work load tremendously.

all_reviews.review_title: I schedule all my social media posts for 20+ marketing clients using Vbout, it Rocks!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about VBOUT?
VBOUT is awesome. I can schedule all my Facebook, Twitter and LInkedin updates for myself and my business as well as my clients in advance. I have a PR firm and we usually manage about 20 different social media profiles on behalf of our clients. In VBOUT we can plan and schedule all posts as well as pull reports. This frees up time to manage engagement for clients on a regular basis too. VBOUT is extremely user friendly and easy to use, I can manage all my accounts in one place and I can also synch in email blasts.

What do you dislike about VBOUT?
I wish that I can also schedule Pinterest and Instagram on there.

What problems is VBOUT solving and how is that benefiting you?
Time and efficiency!
